name: The Adventure
description:
The Adventure - A game for the 2018 LOWREZJAM

Made with Defold

Graphics: Roguelike Pixel Art Assets, some sprites from Ansimuz

Music and sound effects: Alola

Code: https://github.com/britzl/lowrezadventure

Disclaimer: As usual I tend to drift from doing a game to exploring frameworks and new solutions in Defold. This time I explored ways of building enemy (and player) behaviour from components. It became some kind of ECS hybrid, but one that leverages Lua and Defold.
